channel.title: Giving premium players more xp
channel.description:
Hello i was looking in the download section for servers to get some ideas and i found this
Premium Membership: # 1.5x more than the normal experience of a player # 2x the pest control points of a normal player
and
Extreme Membership: # 4x the chance to get a Christmas cracker drop from the Sea Troll Queen or King Black Dragon # 4x the pest control points as a normal member # .5x the zombie points of a normal player # 2x the experience gained from every skill than normal members
I think its a great feature to let premium members get more xp then regular players. I just have no idea how, if you know how or know where a tutorial for it is then please tell me I am using project insanity base Thank you

item.title: Giving premium players more xp
item.dc:creator: @recker450 recker450
item.description:
@recker450 wrote:

or just edit your addskill void/boolean
and make it check there

Read full topic

item.title: Giving premium players more xp
item.dc:creator: @justinxg27 justinxg27
item.description:
@justinxg27 wrote:

I ain’t touched a server in a long time, expecially the xp hitting shit… Though… I think making a simple “else if” statement for the premium variable you use, like… “member” or whatever in your hitting method will work :L

Edit: didnt read topic sorry, You want all skills, not just hits… Well, I could teach you a long way, but I know someone will just comment here with a shorter way and explain to me why its shorter, and I really don’t care…

Read full topic
